mapper.sql: a.ID as id, a.ACCOUNT_ID as accountId, a.ACCOUNT_CODE as accountCode, a.ACCOUNT_TYPE as accountType, a.ACCOUNT_READY as accountReady, a.CUSHION as cushion, a.LEVERAGE_S as leverageS, a.LEVERAGE_C as leverageC, a.LOOK_AHEAD_NEXT_CHANGE as lookAheadNextChange, a.NLV_AND_MARGIN_IN_REVIEW as nlvAndMarginInReview, a.SEGMENT_TITLE_S as segmentTitleS, a.TRADING_TYPE_S as tradingTypeS, a.SEGMENT_TITLE_C as segmentTitleC, a.TRADING_TYPE_C as tradingTypeC, a.DAY_TRADES_REMAINING as dayTradesRemaining, a.DAY_TRADES_REMAINING_T1 as dayTradesRemainingT1, a.DAY_TRADES_REMAINING_T2 as dayTradesRemainingT2, a.DAY_TRADES_REMAINING_T3 as dayTradesRemainingT3, a.DAY_TRADES_REMAINING_T4 as dayTradesRemainingT4, a.CURRENCY as currency, a.ACCRUED_CASH as accruedCash, a.ACCRUED_CASH_S as accruedCashS, a.ACCRUED_CASH_C as accruedCashC, a.ACCRUED_DIVIDEND as accruedDividend, a.ACCRUED_DIVIDEND_S as accruedDividendS, a.ACCRUED_DIVIDEND_C as accruedDividendC, a.AVAILABLE_FUNDS as availableFunds, a.AVAILABLE_FUNDS_S as availableFundsS, a.AVAILABLE_FUNDS_C as availableFundsC, a.BILLABLE as billable, a.BILLABLE_S as billableS, a.BILLABLE_C as billableC, a.BUYING_POWER as buyingPower, a.EQUITY_WITH_LOAN_VALUE as equityWithLoanValue, a.EQUITY_WITH_LOAN_VALUE_S as equityWithLoanValueS, a.EQUITY_WITH_LOAN_VALUE_C as equityWithLoanValueC, a.EXCESS_LIQUIDITY as excessLiquidity, a.EXCESS_LIQUIDITY_S as excessLiquidityS, a.EXCESS_LIQUIDITY_C as excessLiquidityC, a.FULL_AVAILABLE_FUNDS as fullAvailableFunds, a.FULL_AVAILABLE_FUNDS_S as fullAvailableFundsS, a.FULL_AVAILABLE_FUNDS_C as fullAvailableFundsC, a.FULL_EXCESS_LIQUIDITY as fullExcessLiquidity, a.FULL_EXCESS_LIQUIDITY_S as fullExcessLiquidityS, a.FULL_EXCESS_LIQUIDITY_C as fullExcessLiquidityC, a.FULL_INIT_MARGIN_REQ as fullInitMarginReq, a.FULL_INIT_MARGIN_REQ_S as fullInitMarginReqS, a.FULL_INIT_MARGIN_REQ_C as fullInitMarginReqC, a.FULL_MAINT_MARGIN_REQ as fullMaintMarginReq, a.FULL_MAINT_MARGIN_REQ_S as fullMaintMarginReqS, a.FULL_MAINT_MARGIN_REQ_C as fullMaintMarginReqC, a.GROSS_POSITION_VALUE as grossPositionValue, a.GROSS_POSITION_VALUE_S as grossPositionValueS, a.GROSS_POSITION_VALUE_C as grossPositionValueC, a.GUARANTEE as guarantee, a.GUARANTEE_S as guaranteeS, a.GUARANTEE_C as guaranteeC, a.INDIAN_STOCK_HAIRCUT as indianStockHaircut, a.INDIAN_STOCK_HAIRCUT_S as indianStockHaircutS, a.INDIAN_STOCK_HAIRCUT_C as indianStockHaircutC, a.INIT_MARGIN_REQ as initMarginReq, a.INIT_MARGIN_REQ_S as initMarginReqS, a.INIT_MARGIN_REQ_C as initMarginReqC, a.LOOK_AHEAD_AVAILABLE_FUNDS as lookAheadAvailableFunds, a.LOOK_AHEAD_AVAILABLE_FUNDS_S as lookAheadAvailableFundsS, a.LOOK_AHEAD_AVAILABLE_FUNDS_C as lookAheadAvailableFundsC, a.LOOK_AHEAD_EXCESS_LIQUIDITY as lookAheadExcessLiquidity, a.LOOK_AHEAD_EXCESS_LIQUIDITY_S as lookAheadExcessLiquidityS, a.LOOK_AHEAD_EXCESS_LIQUIDITY_C as lookAheadExcessLiquidityC, a.LOOK_AHEAD_INIT_MARGIN_REQ as lookAheadInitMarginReq, a.LOOK_AHEAD_INIT_MARGIN_REQ_S as lookAheadInitMarginReqS, a.LOOK_AHEAD_INIT_MARGIN_REQ_C as lookAheadInitMarginReqC, a.LOOK_AHEAD_MAINT_MARGIN_REQ as lookAheadMaintMarginReq, a.LOOK_AHEAD_MAINT_MARGIN_REQ_S as lookAheadMaintMarginReqS, a.LOOK_AHEAD_MAINT_MARGIN_REQ_C as lookAheadMaintMarginReqC, a.MAINT_MARGIN_REQ as maintMarginReq, a.MAINT_MARGIN_REQ_S as maintMarginReqS, a.MAINT_MARGIN_REQ_C as maintMarginReqC, a.NET_LIQUIDATION as netLiquidation, a.NET_LIQUIDATION_S as netLiquidationS, a.NET_LIQUIDATION_C as netLiquidationC, a.NET_LIQUIDATION_UNCERTAINTY as netLiquidationUncertainty, a.PASHARES_VALUE as pasharesValue, a.PASHARES_VALUE_S as pasharesValueS, a.PASHARES_VALUE_C as pasharesValueC, a.POST_EXPIRATION_EXCESS as postExpirationExcess, a.POST_EXPIRATION_EXCESS_S as postExpirationExcessS, a.POST_EXPIRATION_EXCESS_C as postExpirationExcessC, a.POST_EXPIRATION_MARGIN as postExpirationMargin, a.POST_EXPIRATION_MARGIN_S as postExpirationMarginS, a.POST_EXPIRATION_MARGIN_C as postExpirationMarginC, a.REG_T_EQUITY as regTEquity, a.REG_T_EQUITY_S as regTEquityS, a.REG_T_EQUITY_C as regTEquityC, a.REG_T_MARGIN as regTMargin, a.REG_T_MARGIN_S as regTMarginS, a.REG_T_MARGIN_C as regTMarginC, a.SMA as SMA, a.SMA_S as SMAS, a.SMA_C as SMAC, a.TOTAL_CASHVALUE as totalCashvalue, a.TOTAL_CASHVALUE_S as totalCashvalueS, a.TOTAL_CASHVALUE_C as totalCashvalueC, a.DEBIT_CARD_PENDING_CHARGES as debitCardPendingCharges, a.DEBIT_CARD_PENDING_CHARGES_S as debitCardPendingChargesS, a.DEBIT_CARD_PENDING_CHARGES_C as debitCardPendingChargesC, a.REMARK as remark, a.CREATE_DATE as createDate, a.UPDATE_DATE as updateDate
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO IB_ACCOUNT_BALANCE_MARGIN( ID , ACCOUNT_ID , ACCOUNT_CODE , ACCOUNT_TYPE , ACCOUNT_READY , CUSHION , LEVERAGE_S , LEVERAGE_C , LOOK_AHEAD_NEXT_CHANGE , NLV_AND_MARGIN_IN_REVIEW , SEGMENT_TITLE_S , TRADING_TYPE_S , SEGMENT_TITLE_C , TRADING_TYPE_C , DAY_TRADES_REMAINING , DAY_TRADES_REMAINING_T1 , DAY_TRADES_REMAINING_T2 , DAY_TRADES_REMAINING_T3 , DAY_TRADES_REMAINING_T4 , CURRENCY , ACCRUED_CASH , ACCRUED_CASH_S , ACCRUED_CASH_C , ACCRUED_DIVIDEND , ACCRUED_DIVIDEND_S , ACCRUED_DIVIDEND_C , AVAILABLE_FUNDS , AVAILABLE_FUNDS_S , AVAILABLE_FUNDS_C , BILLABLE , BILLABLE_S , BILLABLE_C , BUYING_POWER , EQUITY_WITH_LOAN_VALUE , EQUITY_WITH_LOAN_VALUE_S , EQUITY_WITH_LOAN_VALUE_C , EXCESS_LIQUIDITY , EXCESS_LIQUIDITY_S , EXCESS_LIQUIDITY_C , FULL_AVAILABLE_FUNDS , FULL_AVAILABLE_FUNDS_S , FULL_AVAILABLE_FUNDS_C , FULL_EXCESS_LIQUIDITY , FULL_EXCESS_LIQUIDITY_S , FULL_EXCESS_LIQUIDITY_C , FULL_INIT_MARGIN_REQ , FULL_INIT_MARGIN_REQ_S , FULL_INIT_MARGIN_REQ_C , FULL_MAINT_MARGIN_REQ , FULL_MAINT_MARGIN_REQ_S , FULL_MAINT_MARGIN_REQ_C , GROSS_POSITION_VALUE , GROSS_POSITION_VALUE_S , GROSS_POSITION_VALUE_C , GUARANTEE , GUARANTEE_S , GUARANTEE_C , INDIAN_STOCK_HAIRCUT , INDIAN_STOCK_HAIRCUT_S , INDIAN_STOCK_HAIRCUT_C , INIT_MARGIN_REQ , INIT_MARGIN_REQ_S , INIT_MARGIN_REQ_C , LOOK_AHEAD_AVAILABLE_FUNDS , LOOK_AHEAD_AVAILABLE_FUNDS_S , LOOK_AHEAD_AVAILABLE_FUNDS_C , LOOK_AHEAD_EXCESS_LIQUIDITY , LOOK_AHEAD_EXCESS_LIQUIDITY_S , LOOK_AHEAD_EXCESS_LIQUIDITY_C , LOOK_AHEAD_INIT_MARGIN_REQ , LOOK_AHEAD_INIT_MARGIN_REQ_S , LOOK_AHEAD_INIT_MARGIN_REQ_C , LOOK_AHEAD_MAINT_MARGIN_REQ , LOOK_AHEAD_MAINT_MARGIN_REQ_S , LOOK_AHEAD_MAINT_MARGIN_REQ_C , MAINT_MARGIN_REQ , MAINT_MARGIN_REQ_S , MAINT_MARGIN_REQ_C , NET_LIQUIDATION , NET_LIQUIDATION_S , NET_LIQUIDATION_C , NET_LIQUIDATION_UNCERTAINTY , PASHARES_VALUE , PASHARES_VALUE_S , PASHARES_VALUE_C , POST_EXPIRATION_EXCESS , POST_EXPIRATION_EXCESS_S , POST_EXPIRATION_EXCESS_C , POST_EXPIRATION_MARGIN , POST_EXPIRATION_MARGIN_S , POST_EXPIRATION_MARGIN_C , REG_T_EQUITY , REG_T_EQUITY_S , REG_T_EQUITY_C , REG_T_MARGIN , REG_T_MARGIN_S , REG_T_MARGIN_C , SMA , SMA_S , SMA_C , TOTAL_CASHVALUE , TOTAL_CASHVALUE_S , TOTAL_CASHVALUE_C , DEBIT_CARD_PENDING_CHARGES , DEBIT_CARD_PENDING_CHARGES_S , DEBIT_CARD_PENDING_CHARGES_C , REMARK, CREATE_DATE , UPDATE_DATE ) VALUES ( #{id} , #{accountId} , #{accountCode} , #{accountType} , #{accountReady} , #{cushion} , #{leverageS} , #{leverageC} , #{lookAheadNextChange} , #{nlvAndMarginInReview} , #{segmentTitleS} , #{tradingTypeS} , #{segmentTitleC} , #{tradingTypeC} , #{dayTradesRemaining} , #{dayTradesRemainingT1} , #{dayTradesRemainingT2} , #{dayTradesRemainingT3} , #{dayTradesRemainingT4} , #{currency} , #{accruedCash} , #{accruedCashS} , #{accruedCashC} , #{accruedDividend} , #{accruedDividendS} , #{accruedDividendC} , #{availableFunds} , #{availableFundsS} , #{availableFundsC} , #{billable} , #{billableS} , #{billableC} , #{buyingPower} , #{equityWithLoanValue} , #{equityWithLoanValueS} , #{equityWithLoanValueC} , #{excessLiquidity} , #{excessLiquidityS} , #{excessLiquidityC} , #{fullAvailableFunds} , #{fullAvailableFundsS} , #{fullAvailableFundsC} , #{fullExcessLiquidity} , #{fullExcessLiquidityS} , #{fullExcessLiquidityC} , #{fullInitMarginReq} , #{fullInitMarginReqS} , #{fullInitMarginReqC} , #{fullMaintMarginReq} , #{fullMaintMarginReqS} , #{fullMaintMarginReqC} , #{grossPositionValue} , #{grossPositionValueS} , #{grossPositionValueC} , #{guarantee} , #{guaranteeS} , #{guaranteeC} , #{indianStockHaircut} , #{indianStockHaircutS} , #{indianStockHaircutC} , #{initMarginReq} , #{initMarginReqS} , #{initMarginReqC} , #{lookAheadAvailableFunds} , #{lookAheadAvailableFundsS} , #{lookAheadAvailableFundsC} , #{lookAheadExcessLiquidity} , #{lookAheadExcessLiquidityS} , #{lookAheadExcessLiquidityC} , #{lookAheadInitMarginReq} , #{lookAheadInitMarginReqS} , #{lookAheadInitMarginReqC} , #{lookAheadMaintMarginReq} , #{lookAheadMaintMarginReqS} , #{lookAheadMaintMarginReqC} , #{maintMarginReq} , #{maintMarginReqS} , #{maintMarginReqC} , #{netLiquidation} , #{netLiquidationS} , #{netLiquidationC} , #{netLiquidationUncertainty} , #{pasharesValue} , #{pasharesValueS} , #{pasharesValueC} , #{postExpirationExcess} , #{postExpirationExcessS} , #{postExpirationExcessC} , #{postExpirationMargin} , #{postExpirationMarginS} , #{postExpirationMarginC} , #{regTEquity} , #{regTEquityS} , #{regTEquityC} , #{regTMargin} , #{regTMarginS} , #{regTMarginC} , #{SMA} , #{SMAS} , #{SMAC} , #{totalCashvalue} , #{totalCashvalueS} , #{totalCashvalueC} , #{debitCardPendingCharges} , #{debitCardPendingChargesS} , #{debitCardPendingChargesC} , #{remark}, #{createDate} , #{updateDate} )

UPDATE IB_ACCOUNT_BALANCE_MARGIN
ACCOUNT_ID = #{accountId} ,
ACCOUNT_CODE = #{accountCode} ,
ACCOUNT_TYPE = #{accountType} ,
ACCOUNT_READY = #{accountReady} ,
CUSHION = #{cushion} ,
LEVERAGE_S = #{leverageS} ,
LEVERAGE_C = #{leverageC} ,
LOOK_AHEAD_NEXT_CHANGE = #{lookAheadNextChange} ,

SEGMENT_TITLE_S = #{segmentTitleS} ,
TRADING_TYPE_S = #{tradingTypeS} ,
SEGMENT_TITLE_C = #{segmentTitleC} ,

DAY_TRADES_REMAINING = #{dayTradesRemaining} ,
DAY_TRADES_REMAINING_T1 = #{dayTradesRemainingT1} ,

DAY_TRADES_REMAINING_T3 = #{dayTradesRemainingT3} ,
DAY_TRADES_REMAINING_T4 = #{dayTradesRemainingT4} ,
CURRENCY = #{currency} ,

ACCRUED_CASH_C = #{accruedCashC} ,

AVAILABLE_FUNDS_C = #{availableFundsC} ,

BILLABLE_C = #{billableC} ,

EQUITY_WITH_LOAN_VALUE_C = #{equityWithLoanValueC} ,

LOOK_AHEAD_INIT_MARGIN_REQ_S = #{lookAheadInitMarginReqS} ,

WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.insert:

CURRENCY , ACCRUED_CASH , ACCRUED_CASH_S , ACCRUED_CASH_C , ACCRUED_DIVIDEND , ACCRUED_DIVIDEND_S , ACCRUED_DIVIDEND_C , AVAILABLE_FUNDS , AVAILABLE_FUNDS_S , AVAILABLE_FUNDS_C , BILLABLE , BILLABLE_S , BILLABLE_C , BUYING_POWER , EQUITY_WITH_LOAN_VALUE , EQUITY_WITH_LOAN_VALUE_S , EQUITY_WITH_LOAN_VALUE_C , EXCESS_LIQUIDITY , EXCESS_LIQUIDITY_S , EXCESS_LIQUIDITY_C , FULL_AVAILABLE_FUNDS , LOOK_AHEAD_AVAILABLE_FUNDS_C , LOOK_AHEAD_EXCESS_LIQUIDITY , LOOK_AHEAD_EXCESS_LIQUIDITY_S , LOOK_AHEAD_EXCESS_LIQUIDITY_C , LOOK_AHEAD_INIT_MARGIN_REQ , LOOK_AHEAD_INIT_MARGIN_REQ_S , LOOK_AHEAD_INIT_MARGIN_REQ_C , LOOK_AHEAD_MAINT_MARGIN_REQ , LOOK_AHEAD_MAINT_MARGIN_REQ_S , LOOK_AHEAD_MAINT_MARGIN_REQ_C , MAINT_MARGIN_REQ , MAINT_MARGIN_REQ_S , MAINT_MARGIN_REQ_C , POST_EXPIRATION_EXCESS_C , POST_EXPIRATION_MARGIN , POST_EXPIRATION_MARGIN_S , POST_EXPIRATION_MARGIN_C , REG_T_EQUITY , REG_T_EQUITY_S , REG_T_EQUITY_C , REG_T_MARGIN , REG_T_MARGIN_S , REG_T_MARGIN_C , SMA , SMA_S , SMA_C , TOTAL_CASHVALUE , TOTAL_CASHVALUE_S , TOTAL_CASHVALUE_C , DEBIT_CARD_PENDING_CHARGES , DEBIT_CARD_PENDING_CHARGES_S , DEBIT_CARD_PENDING_CHARGES_C , REMARK , CREATE_DATE , UPDATE_DATE )

#{item.createDate} , #{item.updateDate} FROM DUAL
